content: * to end of row weaving in ends row 7 *p2 k6 repeat from * to end of row row 8 *p7 k1 repeat from * to end of row gauge repeat row 1-8 seven more times approx 20 sts and 28 row = 4 10 cm in work 6 row in garter stitch pattern stitches #1 thermal bobble knitwise end off pattern support shown in aqua please email cheryl@littlechurchknits com for using the long tail method co 53 sts finishing fastest results work moss stitch border as follows weave in ends wet block to dimensions for standard abbreviations please see row 1 rs *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 https //www craftyarncouncil com/stan- row 2 ws *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 dards/knitting-abbreviations repeat row 1 and 2 one more time place marker 3 sts in from each end keeping the first and last 3 sts in moss stitch as established begin thermal stitch as follows row 1 rs knit #3 basketweave row 2 ws purl shown in green row 3 *p2 k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 using the long tail method co 54 sts row 4 *k2 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 work 6 row in garter stitch knit every row repeat row 1-4 fifteen more times work row 1 and 2 once place marker 3 sts in from each end keeping the first and work moss stitch border last 3 sts in garter stitch as established begin bobble knitwise end basketweave stitch as follows 1 c littlechurchknits com & cheryl toy 2022 | all rights reserved row 1 and 3 rs *k4 p4 repeat from * to end of row row 2 and 4 ws *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of row row 5 and 7 rs *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of row row 6 and 8 ws *k4 p4 repeat from * to end of row repeat row 1-8 eight more times work 6 row in garter stitch bobble knitwise end off #2 windowpane shown in purple using the long tail method co 51 sts work moss stitch border as follows row 1 rs *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 row 2 ws *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 repeat row 1 and 2 one more time notes place marker 3 sts in from each end keeping the first and cloths are worked flat in four different stitch patterns with garter and last 3 sts in moss stitch as established begin windowpane #4 bunting moss stitch borders stitch as follows shown in blue row 1 rs k1 *p1 k2 repeat from * to last 2 sts p1 k1 using the long tail method co 54 sts row 2 ws p1 *k1 p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k1 p1 work 6 row in garter stitch knit every row row 3 repeat row 1 place marker 3 sts in from
